title: 求解怎么设置 MythicMobs 里的自定义怪物能掉落 RPGitems里自定义
author: zh512968076
txt_content: 怎么弄啊烦烦，MythicMobs掉落物能不掉原版物品吗

replies.author: 牧木目
replies.txt_content:
Options:
PreventOtherDrops: true
用指令即可

replies.author: zh512968076
replies.txt_content:
RF_huixue 发表于 2019-7-17 09:53
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-884447-1-1.html 安装这个插件即可
有更高级的版本吗

replies.author: RF_huixue
replies.txt_content:
zh512968076 发表于 2019-7-17 10:44
有更高级的版本吗
你开的服是1.14么？这个1.7~1.13都可以用
